cause.description:
The 17th amendment removed the impartiality required for Senators to advise and consent, conduct impeachment hearings without worrying about constituents and removing State representation in favor of populace representation.
1. Return to Constitutional system of Senate elections
2. Promote the need for an Amendment to the U.S. constitution to repeal the 17th amendment
3. Throw the bums out
cause.mission: Stop the direct election of Senators
cause.name: Repeal the 17th Amendment
